41.ara-name: كتاب العلم عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Salih reported a narration from Abu Hurairah:"It shall soon be that people are beating the livers of camels (meaning that they are hastening and traveling upon them) seeking knowledge. But they will not find anyone more knowledgeable than a scholar of Al-Madinah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي عَالِمِ الْمَدِينَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Scholar Of Al-Madinah
